1.name: Rolex Daytona

1.descriptionEn: Automatic chronograph in steel, black dial with silver counters
1.descriptionIt: Cronografo automatico in acciaio, quadrante nero con contatori in argento

2.descriptionEn: Rose gold case, opaline dial, automatic movement
2.descriptionIt: Cassa in oro rosa, quadrante opalino, movimento automatico

3.name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak
3.description: Steel case and bracelet, blue "Grande Tapisserie" dial
3.descriptionEn: Steel case and bracelet, blue "Grande Tapisserie" dial
3.descriptionIt: Cassa e bracciale in acciaio, quadrante blu "Grande Tapisserie"

4.name: Cartier Santos

4.descriptionEn: Steel and yellow gold case, white dial, automatic movement
4.descriptionIt: Cassa in acciaio e oro giallo, quadrante bianco, movimento automatico

5.name: Vacheron Constantin Overseas
5.description: Steel chronograph, blue dial, integrated bracelet
5.descriptionEn: Steel chronograph, blue dial, integrated bracelet
5.descriptionIt: Cronografo in acciaio, quadrante blu, bracciale integrato

Collection.title: Available Watches
Collection.description: Explore our current collection of exceptional timepieces available for purchase.
Collection.descriptionEn: Explore our current collection of exceptional timepieces available for purchase.
Collection.descriptionIt: Esplora la nostra collezione attuale di orologi eccezionali disponibili per l'acquisto.

meta.title: Archive - The Duke's Chrono
meta.description: Explore our archive of prestigious vintage watches that have found their new homes

SoldPieces.title: Hall of Fame
SoldPieces.description: Each timepiece in this archive represents the pinnacle of vintage watchmaking and our dedication to preserving these timeless treasures.
SoldPieces.descriptionEn: Each timepiece in this archive represents the pinnacle of vintage watchmaking and our dedication to preserving these timeless treasures.
SoldPieces.descriptionIt: Ogni orologio in questo archivio rappresenta l'apice dell'orologeria vintage e il nostro impegno nel preservare questi tesori senza tempo.

meta.title: About Us - The Duke's Chrono
meta.description: Discover the heritage and expertise behind The Duke's Chrono, your trusted source for prestigious vintage watches

heritage.title: A Story of Passion
heritage.description: The Duke's Chrono was born in the heart of Milan from collectors for collectors. Since 1985, we have been selecting the rarest and most prestigious vintage timepieces, becoming a reference point for fine watchmaking enthusiasts seeking the exceptional.
heritage.descriptionEn: The Duke's Chrono was born in the heart of Milan from collectors for collectors. Since 1985, we have been selecting the rarest and most prestigious vintage timepieces, becoming a reference point for fine watchmaking enthusiasts seeking the exceptional.
heritage.descriptionIt: The Duke's Chrono è nato nel cuore di Milano da collezionisti per collezionisti. Dal 1985, abbiamo selezionato i pezzi più rari e prestigiosi dell'orologeria vintage, diventando un punto di riferimento per gli appassionati di orologeria fine alla ricerca dell'eccezionale.

expertise.title: Mastery and Dedication
expertise.description: Our expertise translates into a meticulous search for excellence. Each watch that enters our collection tells a story of technical perfection and timeless beauty, certified through a rigorous authentication process.
expertise.descriptionEn: Our expertise translates into a meticulous search for excellence. Each watch that enters our collection tells a story of technical perfection and timeless beauty, certified through a rigorous authentication process.
expertise.descriptionIt: La nostra esperienza si traduce in una ricerca meticolosa dell'eccellenza. Ogni orologio che entra nella nostra collezione racconta una storia di perfezione tecnica e bellezza senza tempo, certificata attraverso un processo di autenticazione rigoroso.

1.title: Uncompromising Excellence
1.description: We select only specimens that represent the pinnacle of vintage watchmaking, preserving the heritage of the greatest watchmakers.
1.descriptionEn: We select only specimens that represent the pinnacle of vintage watchmaking, preserving the heritage of the greatest watchmakers.
1.descriptionIt: Selezioniamo solo esemplari che rappresentano l'apice dell'orologeria vintage, preservando l'eredità dei più grandi orologiai.

2.title: Guaranteed Authenticity
2.description: Each timepiece undergoes a meticulous verification process that certifies its originality and documents its provenance.
2.descriptionEn: Each timepiece undergoes a meticulous verification process that certifies its originality and documents its provenance.
2.descriptionIt: Ogni orologio subisce un processo di verifica meticoloso che certifica la sua originalità e documenta la sua provenienza.

3.title: Valuable Relationships
3.description: We build lasting bonds with our clients, sharing a passion for excellence and accompanying them in creating unique collections.
3.descriptionEn: We build lasting bonds with our clients, sharing a passion for excellence and accompanying them in creating unique collections.
3.descriptionIt: Costruiamo legami duraturi con i nostri clienti, condividendo una passione per l'eccellenza e accompagnandoli nella creazione di collezioni uniche.

Contact.title: Contact Us

success.messageEn: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
success.messageIt: Grazie per averci contattato. Ti risponderemo presto.
